import { useState } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Layout from '../../components/Layout'; import styles from '../../assets/css/General.module.css'; export default () => { const [moreIcon, setMoreIcon] = useState('fas fa-caret-right'); const [displayMoreOptions, setDisplayMoreOptions] = useState('none'); const [alpersam, setAlpersam] = useState('field group-item passive'); const handleMoreOptions = () => { if (moreIcon === 'fas fa-caret-right') { console.log('goster'); setMoreIcon('fas fa-caret-down'); setDisplayMoreOptions('inline'); } else { console.log('gizle'); setMoreIcon('fas fa-caret-right'); setDisplayMoreOptions('none'); } }; var stil; const alpersamOnClick = () => { // alpersam === 'field group-item active' // ? setAlpersam('field group-item passive') // : setAlpersam('field group-item active'); alpersam === `field active ${styles.groupItem}` ? setAlpersam(`field passive ${styles.groupItem}`) : setAlpersam(`field active ${styles.groupItem}`); }; return ( {/* Bar which has steps to generate opinion poll */}

Generate an opinion poll.


When your poll is ready, fill in the fields below and proceed.

We will send you an email with the link to your poll and the admin area. That's all you will receive - we hate spam too.

{/* Box of tip */}

Tip: If you have multiple polls you can easily organize and manage them with a free Xoyondo account.{' '} Sign up!



); };
